question: What are the genders of <zhongtangxi>, <sanchengmeiqin>, and <jiubuliulang>? A. male, female, male. B. female, male, female.
Which roles often wear glasses? A. <jiubuliulang> and <donghailinxizi>. B. <sanchengmeiqin> and <zhongtangxi>.
What is the common hair color of <zhongtangxi> and <donghailinxizi>? A. Black. B. Brown.
Which roles are often seen in professional attire? A. <sanchengmeiqin> and <jiubuliulang>. B. <zhongtangxi> and <donghailinxizi>.
Do <sanchengmeiqin> and <donghailinxizi> have similar hair length? A. Yes. B. No.
